Posts.EditableText: The player-object has a tab named "Use/Give", but in this tab there is only the possibility to "Use other object an this". Is there the "Give (other object) to this"-option missing or is the name of the tab wrong?
Posts.HTML: The player-object has a tab named "Use/Give", but in this tab there is only the possibility to "Use other object an this". Is there the "Give (other object) to this"-option missing or is the name of the tab wrong?

Posts.EditableText: It's the same tab as the normal object editor. But it doesn't really make sense to be able to give things to yourself, so those options are hidden.
Posts.HTML: It's the same tab as the normal object editor. But it doesn't really make sense to be able to give things to yourself, so those options are hidden.
